body:
User A on a system has a spack instance in her home directory.  She installs a bunch of packages.  In the process of building the packages, temporary files are put in /tmp/spack-staging.  This directory is owned by user A with permissions drwx------.

User B on the same system also creates a spack instance in her home directory.  When she tries to install packages, spack attempts to write to create temporary files in /tmp/spack-staging which fails because this directory is owned by user A.
title: two users using spack on one system can conflict with each other
